sections.text: vehicle, defined.(1) Low-speed vehicle means any:(a) Four-wheeled motor vehicle:(i) With a speed attainable in one mile of more than twenty miles per hour and not more than twenty-five miles per hour on a paved, level surface;(ii) With a gross vehicle weight rating of less than three thousand pounds; and(iii) That complies with 49 C.F.R. part 571, as such part existed on the date specified in section 60-201; or(b) Three-wheeled motor vehicle:(i) With a maximum speed attainable of not more than twenty-five miles per hour on a paved, level surface;(ii) With a gross vehicle weight rating of less than three thousand pounds; and(iii) That is equipped with a windshield and an occupant protection system.(2) Low-speed vehicle does not include a motorcycle with a sidecar attached.SourceLaws 2007, LB286, § 26;Laws 2011, LB289, § 14;Laws 2014, LB776, § 1;Laws 2015, LB313, § 1;Laws 2016, LB929, § 2;Laws 2017, LB263, § 27;Laws 2018, LB909, § 46;Laws 2019, LB79, § 4;Laws 2019, LB270, § 13;Laws 2020, LB944, § 13;Laws 2021, LB149, § 4;Laws 2022, LB750, § 13;Laws 2023, LB138, § 11;Laws 2024, LB1200, § 15;Laws 2025, LB398, § 14.Operative Date: June 5, 2025

60-336.01.Low-speed vehicle, defined.

(1) Low-speed vehicle means any:

(a) Four-wheeled motor vehicle:

(i) With a speed attainable in one mile of more than twenty miles per hour and not more than twenty-five miles per hour on a paved, level surface;

(ii) With a gross vehicle weight rating of less than three thousand pounds; and

(iii) That complies with 49 C.F.R. part 571, as such part existed on the date specified in section 60-201; or

(b) Three-wheeled motor vehicle:

(i) With a maximum speed attainable of not more than twenty-five miles per hour on a paved, level surface;

(ii) With a gross vehicle weight rating of less than three thousand pounds; and

(iii) That is equipped with a windshield and an occupant protection system.

(2) Low-speed vehicle does not include a motorcycle with a sidecar attached.

SourceLaws 2007, LB286, § 26;Laws 2011, LB289, § 14;Laws 2014, LB776, § 1;Laws 2015, LB313, § 1;Laws 2016, LB929, § 2;Laws 2017, LB263, § 27;Laws 2018, LB909, § 46;Laws 2019, LB79, § 4;Laws 2019, LB270, § 13;Laws 2020, LB944, § 13;Laws 2021, LB149, § 4;Laws 2022, LB750, § 13;Laws 2023, LB138, § 11;Laws 2024, LB1200, § 15;Laws 2025, LB398, § 14.Operative Date: June 5, 2025
